Home of JelivA

Jeliva’s Roost  - The largest mountain in Rivertania.  Home Jeliva long before the area was populated.  The mountain is a city of tunnels populated with creatures who live and work under Jeliva’s rule.

Groth - Hobgoblin Warlord - Jeliva’s sargent
Ulas - Giant leader
